page.title:
Proposed Resolution (2) Continued
Proposed Resolution (2) Continued
page.normal_text:
Accessibility of Voter-Verifiable Paper Ballots 3. Any vote casting process that leads to a determinative vote record (an official ballot of record or controlling record used in a recount) must be accessible (affirms the decision of the EAC in adopting the VVSG in 2005).
Accessibility of Voter-Verifiable Paper Ballots
3. Any vote casting process that leads to a determinative vote record (an official
ballot of record or controlling record used in a recount) must be accessible
(affirms the decision of the EAC in adopting the VVSG in 2005).

a. In particular, if a determinative record paper ballot is voter-verifiable, the accessible system must enable a voter with a disability to verify the vote selections on the paper ballot through the same access features as were used to mark the vote selections (affirms Board of Advisors Resolution).
a. In particular, if a determinative record paper ballot is voter-verifiable, the
accessible system must enable a voter with a disability to verify the vote
selections on the paper ballot through the same access features as were
used to mark the vote selections (affirms Board of Advisors Resolution).

b. A voter with a disability must not be required to manually handle a
b. A voter with a disability must not be required to manually handle a

determinative record paper ballot in order to mark, verify or cast the ballot (affirms the decision of the EAC in adopting the VVSG in 2005).
determinative record paper ballot in order to mark, verify or cast the
ballot (affirms the decision of the EAC in adopting the VVSG in 2005).

TGDC Meeting, Jan 2011
TGDC Meeting, Jan 2011
